LanguageData.ARA_Chrony.label: Chrony the 'Warrior Drone'
LanguageData.ARA_Chrony.description: Chrony is an Arachnae Warrior Drone Overseer. Though small in stature, she is highly aggressive and will launch more powerful, large-scale raids within each cycle. Additionally, she will arrange fewer visitors and passing wanderers, and she will not send the Man in Black when the colony is about to fall.
